ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Newbie project stats
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Gnoll Hide lariats seem to be going for 10-15pp are magic (3/20) and will proc stun at 25 (seems WAY to high a start level to me but that is probably why
ygData.messageBody:
> Left out 1 important point...
>
> You need a magic weapon to fight wisps. I think if you sing
> COD and hymn
> with lute equipped you can take one down. You might have to
> run and heal.
> At level 12 throw in a bellow also and you should be OK. I
> had saved up for
> a Dragoon Dirk by this time.

Gnoll Hide lariats seem to be going for 10-15pp are magic (3/20) and will
proc stun at 25 (seems WAY to high a start level to me but that is probably
why the price is so low)

Tszaaz


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
